channel.title: R on Z's blog
channel.description: Recent content in R on Z's blog

item.title: Get p-values for the fixed effect terms in (g)lmer model
item.description: For some reason (see GLMM faq and here for more detail), the lmer function in the lme4 package doesn’t provide p-values for fixed effect terms. If you use lme4::glmer, you’ll find that there are p-values listed in the summary of the model.
